channel.title: Nobody can connect to my server - 15$ paypal reward
channel.description:
Ok so recently i've made a new server and the thing is nobody can connect via my client... I've portfowarded *PortFoward Check say's i have too, Both TCP and UDP* My No-Ip Duc is open... And my server is online... the strange thing is that they can connect from Moparscape's webclient..? :confused:
I'm offering a 15$ Paypal reward or a Runescape Account (Main - lvl 124 + 99str + 6m cash, Zerker - lvl 96 + 91strength\firecape\void + 6m cash, Pure - 64 + 75strength\45summoning\72magic\Mith Gloves\Dt done + 14m Cash 20K Alch's Wizard Boot's and Wizzy (T) hat)
Im requesting Help over teamviewer if possible... If you know how to help, or can suggest something that may work please do add me on MSN; Bpstanding08@hotmail.com
Thanks :|

item.title: Nobody can connect to my server - 15$ paypal reward
item.dc:creator: @VbCoder VbCoder
item.description:
@VbCoder wrote:

Search in your client folder after the IP adress, and change it to your .no-ip

Read full topic

item.title: Nobody can connect to my server - 15$ paypal reward
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Have you made sure to replace ALL serverIP settings in the client? Some clients will have the serverIP set in 2-3 different files.

Read full topic

Hoped this help[/quote] I am using Both… Kylerscape Client And Source… =/
